attributes.review: My phone turned into a purple Marshmello because of this app. I’m very upset that my little giraffe was mad so I took a ride to the park so I could walk him but then I saw some rainbow zebras and fed them sunflower seeds. Hate the app!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and now my pet iguana won’t stop singing Yankee Doodle. I honestly cannot with this app anymore. Deleting immediately. Next time Trump thinks about doing something he should Yankee Don’t.
